name: The Best Defender
description:
Experience this fresh take on tower defense games, where you are both attacking and defending.  Step into the shoes of Tobias Bartholomew Defender as he embarks on a quest to become The Best Defender. Experience new terrains and face new challenges through the multiple levels of TBD.

How To Play:

Lead your own troops to destroy the enemy base, while defending your own base from enemy troops.

Move with [W] [A] [S] [D]

[Left click] to attack enemy units

[Left click] on unit icons to spawn troops and towers

Meet the team:
